mapper.select: SELECT O.O_NO, OD.OD_NO, O.O_TIME, O.O_NUMBER, P.P_NO, P.P_BRAND, P.P_NEWIMAGE1, P.P_NAME, OD.OD_AMOUNT, OD.OD_STATUS, OD.OD_REVIEW FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE O.O_NUMBER=OD.O_NUMBER AND OD.P_NO=P.P_NO AND O.M_ID=#{m_id} AND O.O_TIME BETWEEN #{leftdate} AND #{rightdate} ORDER BY O.O_NO DESC

SELECT O.O_NO, OD.OD_NO, O.O_TIME, O.O_NUMBER, P.P_NO, P.P_BRAND, P.P_NEWIMAGE1, P.P_NAME, OD.OD_AMOUNT, OD.OD_STATUS, OD.OD_REVIEW FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE O.O_NUMBER=OD.O_NUMBER AND OD.P_NO=P.P_NO AND O.M_ID=#{m_id} AND (O.O_TIME BETWEEN SYSDATE-30 AND SYSDATE) ORDER BY O.O_NO DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL OD WHERE O.O_NUMBER=OD.O_NUMBER AND O.M_ID=#{m_id} AND OD.OD_STATUS='발송완료'
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM MYQNA WHERE M_ID=#{m_id} AND MQ_STATUS=2 AND MQ_TYPE=2 AND MQ_DEL=0

SELECT OD.OD_NO, P.P_NO, P.P_BRAND, P.P_NEWIMAGE1, P.P_NAME, OD.OD_STARTDATE, OD.OD_ENDDATE, OD.OD_STATUS, OD.OD_REVIEW FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE O.O_NUMBER=OD.O_NUMBER AND OD.P_NO=P.P_NO AND O.M_ID=#{m_id} AND (OD.OD_STATUS='배송완료' OR OD.OD_STATUS='회수완료') AND OD.OD_REVIEW IS NULL

SELECT R.R_NO, R.M_ID, P.P_NO, R.O_NUMBER, R.R_SCOPE, R.R_CONTENT, R.R_FILENAME, R.R_NEWFILENAME, R.R_LIKECOUNT, R.R_DEL, R.R_WDATE, P.P_BRAND, P.P_NAME, P.P_NEWIMAGE1 FROM REVIEW R, PRODUCT P WHERE R.P_NO=P.P_NO AND R.M_ID=#{m_id} AND R.R_DEL=0 ORDER BY R.R_NO DESC

SELECT b.M_ID, b.R_NO, b.O_NUMBER, b.R_SCOPE, b.R_CONTENT, b.R_NEWFILENAME, b.R_LIKECOUNT, b.R_WDATE, b.R_FILENAME, b.P_NO, c.P_BRAND, c.P_NAME, c.P_TYPE1, c.P_NEWIMAGE1, b.R_STATUS, b.R_DEL FROM REVIEW b, PRODUCT c WHERE b.P_NO = c.P_NO AND b.R_NO = #{r_no}

SELECT A.RP_NO, B.R_NO, A.RP_WDATE, A.RP_CONTENT, M_ID, P_NO, O_NUMBER, R_SCOPE, R_CONTENT, R_FILENAME, R_NEWFILENAME, R_LIKECOUNT, R_DEL, R_WDATE, R_STATUS FROM R_REPLY A, REVIEW B WHERE A.R_NO = B.R_NO AND A.R_NO=#{r_no} AND B.R_STATUS='답변완료'
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET R_SCOPE=#{r_scope}, R_CONTENT=#{r_content}, R_FILENAME=#{r_filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_NEWFILENAME=#{r_newfilename}, R_WDATE=SYSDATE WHERE R_NO=#{r_no}
mapper.select: SELECT P.P_NO, P.P_BRAND, P.P_NEWIMAGE1, P.P_NAME, OD.OD_STARTDATE, OD.OD_ENDDATE, OD.OD_STATUS, O.O_NUMBER, OD.OD_NO, OD.OD_PERIOD, OD.OD_AS, OD.OD_AMOUNT, O.O_TIME FROM ORDERS O, ORDER_DETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE O.O_NUMBER=OD.O_NUMBER AND OD.P_NO=P.P_NO AND O.M_ID=#{m_id} AND (OD.OD_STATUS='배송완료' OR OD.OD_STATUS='회수완료') ORDER BY OD.OD_NO ASC
